column1: * Description      : To determine the Effective Date of recent Assignment Status change for an empployee in Assignment Record.
* Logic            : Compare the current Assignment Status with previous rows until there is a change identified.
IF TRACE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN (RET = ESS_LOG_WRITE(' AXE_HR_EMPL_STATUS_RULE_FF- Starts '))

IF TRACE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN (RET = ESS_LOG_WRITE(' S_PERSON_ID = '|| S_PERSON_ID || ', ' || ' S_ASSIGNMENT_ID = '|| S_ASSIGNMENT_ID|| ', ' || ' S_ASG_START_DATE = '|| S_ASG_START_DATE || ', '|| ' S_ASSIGNMENT_STATUS = '|| S_ASSIGNMENT_STATUS))

column3: IF TRACE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN (RET = ESS_LOG_WRITE(' L_HIST_ASS_ID = '|| TO_CHAR(L_HIST_ASS_ID) || ', '||' L_HIST_ASSIGNMENT_STATUS = '|| L_HIST_ASSIGNMENT_STATUS ))
IF TRACE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN (RET = ESS_LOG_WRITE(' L_ASG_STATUS_CHG_DT_1 = '|| L_ASG_STATUS_CHG_DT_1))

column1: IF TRACE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN (RET = ESS_LOG_WRITE(' Return Value = '|| RULE_VALUE))
IF TRACE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN (RET = ESS_LOG_WRITE(' AXE_HR_EMPL_STATUS_RULE_FF- Ends '))
